name: Final Plantasy
description:
Final Plantasy ... As you can tell is an RPG.

Made as a joke in 2013 in about 4 weeks using gamemaker. (also practically the first game I ever made)

If I'm being honest the game is really old and hasn't been updated in a while. We also practically lost the original files of the game.

UI text in the game doesn't adapt well to new OS systems or to aspect scaling. I figured I might as well give my sins the light of day.

Game was made by all engineers (which I hope explains the 4th grade drawings)

Controls:

We made a text tutorial in the game(Oh Gawd).

But to summarize:

-You have two resources, sunlight and water

-Using these, you buy skills by dragging and dropping. Using skills also costs these resources during battle.

-Every day you have a text event

-Every day you have a battle event where you have to click abilities to kill enemies.

- You basically have to survive for like 10 days(I think).

The game is really hard. Like we have some OP enemies that exponentially scale if you don't kill them fast enough. Some just straight up troll you.

So just a forewarning if the game feels Janky.
